title: Jo Anne Brasel MD Pediatric Endocrine Fund
description: To support the Jo Anne Brasel Lectureship/Visiting Professor in Endocrinology to provide continuing educational opportunities for faculty and trainees. Secondary preference is to provide funds for individual start-up research in pediatric endocrinology.
marketingContent: To support the Jo Anne Brasel Lectureship/Visiting Professor in Endocrinology to provide continuing educational opportunities for faculty and trainees. Secondary preference is to provide funds for individual start-up research in pediatric endocrinology.
